General.Name: Fremont Gold Ltd
General.Description: Fremont Gold Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in the United States and Canada. The company explores for gold and copper deposit. The company was formerly known as Palisades Ventures Inc. and changed its name to Fremont Gold Ltd. in June 2017. Fremont Gold Ltd. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2
